startView.info: A card game. Unfortunately for engineers.

aboutView.explanation1: Create a game on a screen that all players can see. You choose how many cards to have on hand and how many rounds you play, etc.
aboutView.explanation2: Players join the game from their own devices
aboutView.explanation3: The screen shows a black card with a blank on it that needs to be filled in.
aboutView.explanation4: The players are given white cards with possible answers to fill in the blank ____
aboutView.explanation7: The choices are shown anonymously, and you vote for which one is the funniest.
aboutView.explanation8: The player with the most voted option wins the round.
aboutView.explanation9: The player with the most won rounds wins
